name: withAudioBufferList(blockBufferMemoryAllocator:flags:body:)
desc: Calls a closure with an audio buffer list that contains the data from a sample buffer and a block buffer backing the audio buffers.
declaration: func withAudioBufferList<R>(blockBufferMemoryAllocator: CFAllocator? = kCFAllocatorDefault, flags: CMSampleBuffer.Flags = [], body: (UnsafeMutableAudioBufferListPointer, CMBlockBuffer) throws -> R) throws -> R
